name: The Concordian Empire
declaringWar: You will be crushed under Imperial might!
attacked: You will be slaughtered for your actions!
defeated: I have failed not only my people but my gods... may your rule be merciful.
introduction: The people of the Empire welcome you.
neutralLetsHearIt: We are willing to hear your offer.
neutralYes: It is a pleasure to have done this deal.
We are glad to have accepted this ofer.
hateNo: We do not deem your proposal beneficial.
We will not conform to your arrogance.
afterPeace: Continued war would have lead to our shared destruction.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: Heavier more powerful units which are more costtly to build
